titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jenny K. Johnson, Ph. D.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 6/21/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising from the negligence of the Department of State for occasioning delay in arranging medical evacuation from Nigeria following an accident.
